name: Line Escape - Bloody Stickman Run Free
name_original: Line Escape - Bloody Stickman Run Free
description:
*** BLOODIEST AND MOST CHALLENGING STICKMAN YET! ***
*** ALL LEVELS UNLOCKED ***

This time stickman faces his greatest challenge, razor blades of death! Run, jump, duck and most of all don't die! Will you survive the gauntlet?

* Terrifying platform levels, including pit falls, razors and spikes!
* Running, jumping, ducking and blood galore!

DOWNLOAD IT TODAY!
